CpuOptions.description: specifies the CPU options for an instance.

properties.name: AmdSevSnp
properties.description: Indicates whether to enable the instance for AMD SEV-SNP. AMD SEV-SNP is supported with M6a, R6a, and C6a instance types only.

type.description: Indicates whether to enable the instance for AMD SEV-SNP. AMD SEV-SNP is supported with M6a, R6a, and C6a instance types only.

type.description: The number of CPU cores for the instance.

properties.description: The number of threads per CPU core. To disable multithreading for the instance, specify a value of 1. Otherwise, specify the default value of 2.

Ebs.description: Parameters for a block device for an EBS volume in an Amazon EC2 launch template.

properties.description: Indicates whether the EBS volume is deleted on instance termination.

type.description: Indicates whether the EBS volume is deleted on instance termination.

properties.name: Encrypted
properties.description: Indicates whether the EBS volume is encrypted. Encrypted volumes can only be attached to instances that support Amazon EBS encryption. If you are creating a volume from a snapshot, you can't specify an encryption value.

type.description: Indicates whether the EBS volume is encrypted. Encrypted volumes can only be attached to instances that support Amazon EBS encryption. If you are creating a volume from a snapshot, you can't specify an encryption value.

properties.description: The throughput to provision for a gp3 volume, with a maximum of 1,000 MiB/s.

type.description: The throughput to provision for a gp3 volume, with a maximum of 1,000 MiB/s.

properties.description: The size of the volume, in GiBs. You must specify either a snapshot ID or a volume size.

properties.description: Enables or disables the HTTP metadata endpoint on your instances. If the parameter is not specified, the default state is enabled.
